title: Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia
content:
Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia Type Quest Act Act 3 Location House of Grief Reward __reward__

Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia

Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia can be acquired during Act 3. This quest can be obtained when you reach Baldur's Gate. All Baldur's Gate quests will be grouped together in your quest journal. It is a subquest for the Investigate the House of Grief quest and is a part of Shadowheart's Questline: Daughter
